Features

Backlink Audit Tool

Backlink Audit Tool

Keep your backlink profile healthy with a complete audit. Collect personalized insights to make the right decisions and avoid penalties.

Try It Free
Link Evaluation Made Easy
Know the value of every link you have – good or bad. Investigate with over 50+ parameters on any link, get custom insights, and remove or disavow any harmful links.
Check Your Toxicity Score

Get the full picture of your backlink profile with a single Toxicity Score. Then, dive deeper into the details of your score with toxic markers and backlink metrics.

Get Personalized Insights

Collect up to 28 different backlink profile insights and recommendations to make the right moves with any suspicious links detected.

Take Action

As you analyze links, you can organize your links into lists for keeping or removal. If removal via outreach doesn’t work out, you can collect backlinks into a .txt file and send it directly to the Google Disavow tool with one click.

More features for smooth discovery and removal of suspicious backlinks
Integrate with Google Search Console

Connect Google Search Console to your Semrush account to spot a greater number of backlinks. Upload an external backlink list directly into the tool.

Try It Free
Run Regular Recrawls

A major audit of your backlink profile is just the beginning. Recrawl your backlink profile regularly to keep an eye out for any new links (good or bad), lost links, or broken links that may appear.

Try It Free
Find Pages That Attract the Most Backlinks

Connect Google Analytics and see which of your pages with links attract the most attention. This tells you what worked and what didn’t bring success from your outreach efforts.

Try It Free
Monitor your backlink profile and keep it clean for the long run
Try It Free
